modName: E55 Argonian and Khajiit  Female Body Replacer
summary: This will add the Argonian and Khajiit beastrace to our bodymod , it is playable seperated but still need assets of the E55 bodytype to let it work
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://dc616.4shared.com/img/rCUWV7ae/s7/13ffe126da0/vendorglosshousebeast.png?async&rand=0.05323506171729819[/img]


- Now fully suport both  Argonian and Khajiit Races stand alone mod E55 Beast Race 


This will add the Argonian and Khajiit beastrace to our bodymod , this is completely stand alone mod and wont replace any human bodymeshes from E55 or any other human body replacers to let this work



- E55 Female body layout is different from other bodymods. Because of the UV layout of the E55 body replacer  i needed to create a extra texturefile for the tails  to get the feet textures of the beastraces fit to our body mesh. Vanilla textures layouts  are  the tail placed on the same template as the bodytexture.The tail get in the way for our feet is the reason why E55 got an extra texture file



- The E55 textures were made for the E55 body replacer and made to blend together. If you use other textures or mesh files then the ones provided with the mod - this includes face textures - you will most likely get seams and texture mismatch/distortion. 
To achieve the result from the screen shots you must use our textures together as a set. We cannot help with texture issues that arise from using other body mods textures with ours.

- For the Khajiit Race: I create a complete new body texture for the Khajiit females, i tryed to keep it between cats and humanized animanls. I put some new foot sole underneath the feet and toes, i think they look awsome. I tryed to create a realy furry looking bodyskin,Some few places i still need to work on the seams,but they will be solved in the next update. I wish i could make a good normal texture file,but sadly i can\'t. 

- There are no facial skin included for khajiit in this mod, i use myself personaly 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5941/?]Coverkhajiits by mrLenski  [/url] . Is fully compatible with E55 Khajiit body texture. reason is simple i didn\'t create one, it is an awsome cat face 


[b][size=5]
Installation:[/b][/size]

extract the archives into your Skyrim data folder.

Deinstallation:

delete the files!


Here is the list of the base files and where they will be copied:


[b][size=5]
MESHES:[/b][/size]

All of the following meshes will be written to: meshes\\character\\character assets\\
femalebodyargonian_0
femalebodyargonian_1
femalefeetargonian_0.nif 
femalefeetargonian_1.nif 
femalehandsargonian_0.nif 
femalehandsargonian_1.nif 
femaletailargonian.nif

femalebodykhajiit_0
femalebodykhajiit_1
femalehandsKhajiit_0
femalehandsKhajiit_1
femalefeetkhajiit_0
femalefeetkhajiit_1
femaletailkhajiit.nif

[b][size=5]
BODY SKIN TEXTURES:[/b][/size]

All of the following textures will be written to: 
textures\\actors\\character\\female\\argonianfemale
textures\\actors\\character\\female\\khajiitfemale


Argonian:
argonianfemalehands.dds
argonianfemalehands_msn.dds
argonianfemalehands_s.dds
argonianfemalehead.dds
argonianfemalehead_msn.dds
argonianfemalehead_s.dds
argonianfemaletail.dds
argonianfemaletail_msn.dds
argonianfemaletail_s.dds
nailarg.dds
nailarg_n.dds


Khajiit:
khajiitfemalehands.dds
khajiitfemalehands_msn.dds
khajiitfemalehands_s.dds
khajiitfemaletail.dds
khajiitfemaletail_msn.dds
khajiitfemaletail_s.dds
KhajiitNail.dds
KhajiitNail_n.dds


[b][size=5]
Plugin:[/b][/size]

The following esp file will be written to: skyrim\\Data\\E55_BeastRace.esp
author: Glosshouse
